Text.Language: Ni,wra t/rou n~te Ieri,w: nem p~twou n~te nijwit nem Il#/#m#: a~mwini a~nau e~tainis] n~s~v/ri: y/e~tacswpi qen p~hop n~t~Kana n~te ]Galilea~
All the cities of Jericho, and the mount of Olives and Jerusalem: Come! See! this great wonder: which happened at the Wedding at Cana of Galilee.

Vai pe pihouit m~m/ini e~ta pencwt/r n~a~gayoc: aif m~pem~yo n~nefmay/t/c aunah] e~rof je Pi,~rictoc
This is the first miracle: which our good Savior performed: before His disciples: they believed in Him, that He is the Christ.

I/couc piremnazarey afc~mou e~nimwou afaitou n~/rp: m~pe h~li nau e~ous~v/ri eco~ni n~yai: icjen Adam sa e~qoun m~voou
Jesus the Nazarene: blessed the waters, and made them wine. Nobody saw a wonder like this: from Adam until today.

Coou n~hudria m~mwou ou/rp efcwtp akouw~teb m~mwou: e~bolqen peknis] n~wou: qen p~hop n~t~Kana n~te ]Galilea
Six jars of water: You turned into select wine: from Your great glory: in the wedding of Cana of Galilee.

Arip~recbeuin e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ ten[oic n~n/b t/ren ]yeo~tokoc: Maria y~mau n~I/couc Pi,~rictoc: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Intercede on our behalf, O Lady of us all the Theotokos, Mary the Mother of Jesus Christ, that He may forgive us our sins.
